trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There was one other sighting in St Louis on or around May 31st 2012
Summary: Side by side small cotton ball look to them. edge of cotton ball kind of fuzzy not smooth around it . seemed to tumble once like floating. Moving real fast east to west straight line.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting the back patio with my friend. We were talking about 7 sisters. i was looking up in the northeastern sky and spotted it moving east to west steady but faster than i have seen any planes or satalites before. This was in a place called soulard missouri.I first thought it was two white ish balloons tethered together. It moved across the section of sky i was looking at in about 7 seconds untill i couldn't see it anymore, buildings and trees were in the way. They both looked fuzzy but a real kind of faded white. i could not see anything holding them close together like a tether or anything, but they were moving in tandum. they slowly switched places of sort, like a slow tumble as it moved across the sky. About a second after i first spotted it i had goose bumps and the hair on my arms back of neck and back stood up. Really freaked me out. i have seen thigs before never like this. They a lot bigger than the stars. As soon as i saw them i stood up and watched them until i could not see them anymore.
